HomePage.title: Turn Shapes into Routes
HomePage.description: Upload an image or draw a shape, and Routista will generate a real-world GPS route that matches it. Perfect for running, cycling, or just exploring.

anyShape.title: Any Shape, Anywhere
anyShape.description: Upload a heart, a star, or your logo. We'll find the best matching roads in your chosen area.

whatIs.title: What is Routista?
whatIs.description: Routista is a fun, free tool for runners, cyclists, and explorers who want to create GPS art or just spice up their training. Upload an image, edit the shape manually, or draw from scratch ‚Äì Routista will find the best matching roads.

1.title: Select Area
1.description: Choose where you want to run or cycle

2.title: Input Shape
2.description: Upload an image, edit points, or draw standard shapes

3.title: Generate
3.description: The algorithm snaps your shape to real-world streets

4.title: Export
4.description: Get your GPX file and go!

magic.title: Shape-to-Route Magic:
magic.description: Choose from ready-made examples, upload an image, fine-tune points manually, or draw from scratch

mapping.title: Interactive Mapping:

privacy.title: Privacy Focused:

creator.title: Created By
creator.description: Routista is a passion project designed to bring creativity to fitness activities. Whether you're planning a heart-shaped run for Valentine's Day or want to spell out your initials across your city, Routista makes GPS art accessible to everyone.

support.title: Support the Project
support.description: If you enjoy using Routista, consider buying me a coffee! Your support helps keep the service free and fuels new features.
support.contribute: Contributions are welcome! Feel free to open issues or submit pull requests.
